tutorial_talks.content: Fantastic news, kupo! I've done it!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I've found a way you can take 4 Soul Breaks into battle!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Very impressive, Dr. Mog!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_laugh

tutorial_talks.content: That means you can pick just the right Soul Break for the moment, kupo! Imagine the flexibility!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I think I get it!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: Oh, and you can pick your Soul Breaks from the Party screen and the Camp screen, kupo! Rejoice in the convenience!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That IS convenient!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_laugh

tutorial_talks.content: Wait...but heroes can only have a default Soul Break, a weapon Soul Break, and an armor Soul Break. Where's the fourth come from?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: Good question, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: It just so happens that I've made another "break"-through! It's called Soul Break Mastery!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Sounds tricky...
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: Not at all, kupo! You use a weapon with a Soul Break, and your Mastery will increase until that hero masters the Soul Break!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Master a Soul Break, and you don't need that weapon to use it any more! It's amazing, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Oh, but you should know that a hero can only master Soul Breaks unique to that hero.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Shared Soul Breaks don't belong to any particular hero, so they can't be mastered.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Right.
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: So, let me get this straight. We can use Soul Breaks a hero has mastered and Soul Breaks from equipment?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_laugh

tutorial_talks.content: Exactly, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Now use those Soul Breaks and restore some records, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Yes sir!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi
